item.title: Customizing
item.description: Customizing this damn site is kinda hard 🤦‍♂️😭. Hugo is a damn pain in the ass I’ve been trying to learn this crap but it’s taking a while…

item.title: New theme 😎
item.description: After tinkering and messing up inside Hugo, I changed some things up in this theme! Next up is to implement some widgets to make my life easier..
item.content:
After tinkering and messing up inside Hugo, I changed some things up in this theme!

Next up is to implement some widgets to make my life easier..
